website_summaries.verdict: This accordion-style shade is custom-patterned to fit select Chevrolet and GMC vehicles, though the company offers styles for other makes and models.
pros: For select Chevrolet and GMC vehicles, although company offers styles for other makes and models
Custom-patterned to follow the contours of the windshield

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new to me 2008 Chevy Tahoe which lives outside hoping to protect the dashboard and black leather seats from the sweltering TX sun. The fit and finish on the shade is phenomenal. As others have said there is like a 1" gap in parts, but if that gap wasn't there, it would be a headache to get in and out of position. Slap it up there, flip the sun visors down to hold it in place, and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly, keeps car cool
customer_reviews.text: It fits the windshield perfectly and does a good job of keeping the vehicle from getting obnoxiously hot. The way it folds for storage is a little weird and inconvenient but the performance makes it worth it. It is obviously more expensive than most alternatives but I bought a cheaper one for another vehicle and I've determined I got what I paid for. If you want something that helps a little and kind of fits then get a cheap one. If you want one that makes a big difference and fits perfectly then the extra $ you'll spend on this will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AP/DP

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and keeps it cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality sunshade, and it fits perfectly in the windshield. It has a substantial feel to it, not like those floppy sunshades sold at the stores. Keeps the vehicles noticeably cooler and doesn't allow any sunlight to pass through the windshield. This keeps the dash cool and protects the plastic surfaces and the leather seats inside. I use mine daily. It folds up nearly into itself like an accordion. It also looks like a custom product from Chevy.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: This is for the windshield not the back glass y'all!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how much better people would want this to fit. If it was any larger it would be too tough to get into place. I'll try to give an update in about a year. My truck sits all day long and is only driven on weekends to haul the toys. There's roughly a half inch on each side...see picture.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but is NOT a custom fit.
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of reviews, I decided to buy this one. I received it and it looked like pretty good quality. While it does the job, this is by no means a custom fit cover, despite what the company claims. This particular one (which is the correct one for my vehicle) leaves a gap on one side or the other. Also, in order to put it up into the windshield, it is constantly knocking my rear view mirror out of alignment. Shouldn't happen if this was 'custom fit'. I regret spending this kind of money on this. As others have stated, at this price a storage bag should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly a custom fit for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and it is advertised as a custom fit for my Pacifica. Well simply it is not. It does not fit end to end and looks like any other one size fits all device. It is sturdy all right but hard to maneuver into place. You have to use the visors to hold it into place since it is short in width. For what you get it is over priced. I did not return the item because they all are the same usually. They are not made for the specific model you are ordering for but neverthe less it says Custom fit. NOT TRUE!
customer_reviews.author: Fred A. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great sunshade!
customer_reviews.text: This sunshade is thick! I have a similar one for one of my cars and they do a great job of blocking the heat. I bought this for my 2007 Chevy Silverado 2500HD. It is a little snug on my truck but I also have a gauge pod which seems to be causing the snugness. Without the gauge pod I am sure it would fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It is great if it fits your vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: Its made of very thick material but it doesn’t fit my truck very well. It is harder to install due to the rigid sides. It folds up beautifully compared to the one I have from WeatherTech, but WeatherTech definitely fits my 2013 Chevy Avalanche better. However, I have one for a 2018 Jeep and it fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: TamCal

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect little gap around the edges just enough to make ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 08 Sierra. Fits perfect little gap around the edges just enough to make it easy to install and uninstall. Material seems to be made pretty good although I question the front of it may scratch easy... Blocks heat very well here in San Antonio Texas. Because of its size and how it folds it does take up a little room when not in use. But it's worth it because of such a great job of blocking heat.
customer_reviews.author: WR .S

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Amazon shows this as fitting my 2009 Chevrolet 2500hd. It does fit, but less than stellar. There is a good inch of space around the side and top edges. I definitely wouldn't say it fits enough to call it a custom cut. Somewhat disappointed. It does the job as well as any cheap department store one, but not much better. Quality of material is nice but I really I expected a better fit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a 2013 Yukon Denali
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for a 2013 Yukon Denali, about 1/2" of space on each side towards the bottom but that's just about the right amount of space so you don't have to fight to get it in place and remove it. Nice and thick and rigid with preformed fold seams so it doesn't bow in the middle and half fall out of the window like the cheap $10 ones. Protects the dash very well and greatly lowers the interior temp if you park facing the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2013 Tahoe. Very well made and will last a long time. I couldn't be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great product, but windshield cover and the box was damaged Update - it might do really well for protection against uv damage to the interior but does nothing to really cool the truck it's 90° outsider and 99° in the truck, save the money buy a cheap one at Walmart $13 vs $55 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. Took off 1 star because there should be a strap or something to hold it together when it’s not being used when I’m driving. Other than that, it works great and keeps car cooler!!
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: ordering from a vendor from amazon, does not always go the wright way
customer_reviews.text: 2 times in a week. I ordered a car windshield cover and received a window cover for a truck. next time I will order from Weatherteck direct
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL KENNON

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good, but the few pleats makes it kinda bulky to store. It also seems to be just a cheap foam wrapped in a cheap fabric. It works ok, but it definitely isn’t top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond wolff jr.

customer_reviews.title: Dashboard cover beware
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dash cover or a broad view mirror over the stock putting it on or taking it off makes it challenge. Coverage is great overall.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Too small for Chev Silverado, large gap across the top
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Combs

customer_reviews.title: Prefect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2009 Chevrolet Silverado. The fit is perfect. I believe the custom style is much more efficient than universal shades. The reason I believe this is because it fits tight against the glass. In addition this is quality built with thick material. The front is not super shiny but somewhat matte. The back is felt lined. When I purchased this the price on Amazon was even cheaper than direct from the manufacturer. I am very picky about how my vehicles look and the accessories I install. This really gives a classy look.
customer_reviews.author: BigRedCuda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband's SUV. Well made, fits perfectly. And most of all in the hot desert sun it keeps our vehicle cool enough to sit on the black leather seats while cooling it down without having to turn the seat cooling system on. It is awesome and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Doe Rae Me Fa So La Te doe

customer_reviews.title: I have bought 4 of these and will keep buying.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these sunvisors for the last 4 cars I've owned and I've always been impressed. They are very sturdy, not flimsy and floppy like cheap, auto part store visors. They also form perfectly to the windshield and block out nearly all light. I love it. Keeps my dash and steering wheel cool and prevents sun damage. Will buy another for my next car as well!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: 2010 Cadillac Escalade
customer_reviews.text: Not to happy with this one. I purchased one awhile back for a Lexus and it worked perfect. This one not so much. I received it with a crease that wont go away and it doesn't go against the window properly. On the escalade there is a little box right under the mirror and that box keeps it from sitting against the window completely. This claims to be a "custom" fit but obliviously its a universal or other SUVs.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: works great, can tell the difference in temperature inside the car.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Aguayo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2011 subruban like a glove. Saved almost $40 getting this one compared to another site listed at $70
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G.

customer_reviews.title: nice product!!
customer_reviews.text: The sun screen fit well in my 2013 GMC 2500 truck. It stayed in place with little assistance with the sunvisiors. The sun screen was thick material and folded up easily for storage,
customer_reviews.author: Larry M

customer_reviews.title: Beware it Doesn't Fit
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit my 2007 Chevy Silverado 1500 ext cab LTZ. it's too large! Too long, too tall and a different shape then the windshield. I will be returning it, and then re-order with a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Pease

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2010 Chevy Silverado!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of equipment! It fits perfectly, it does the job that was made for. And when this visor wears out, I’m going to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Tomato

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect the plastic, vinyl or whatever it is made of, dashboard on my 2013 Chevy Silverado. It is doing the job well, keeps the dashboard surface temperature to a reasonable level. In our SoCal 100 degree+ summer temperatures I need all the help I can get preserving my trucks interior. Loving this sun shade!!!
customer_reviews.author: CSchena

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It - It’s Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Worth Every Penny!!!!! In the Vegas Heat This Has Been A Life Saver! Perfect Fit And Amazing Difference With This Shade
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2013 Silverado 1500
customer_reviews.text: Fits 2013 Chevy Silverado like it was made for it. No light gaps.
customer_reviews.author: IdoIT4Fun

customer_reviews.title: The best fit of any sunshade
customer_reviews.text: The best fit of any sunshade , and we have had alot over the years. This sunshade is rather snug which means it does a better job reflecting the light, and gives you a nice clean look. This one won us over as we purchase it for a 2013 Chevy Silverado LTZ and have now purchased a second one for our Dodge Challenger as well. Any future vehicle purchases will also have one, it really keeps the temperature down in the hot North Carolina sun! Worth the investment and then some, just make sure you go to the covercraft website to ensure you get the proper shade fit for your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Cyclone Fan

customer_reviews.title: The interior does not get as hot.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these. One for a 2012 Jeep and one for 1999 GMC Yukon. Both fit perfectly. They are big and cumbersome to handle but work great. I've had them for a couple of months and have notice the fabric backing (The part inside the cabin) is starting to develop air bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: 2010 Avalanche
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2010 avalanche no problems keeps it cool when the heat is hot.
customer_reviews.author: Gigzaw

customer_reviews.title: Almost a little too good of a fit
customer_reviews.text: Almost a little too good of a fit -- so snug it sometimes bumps the mirror out of alignment when I put it up or take it down. Blocks out plenty of sunlight and keeps the truck cool.
customer_reviews.author: B. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit Excellent Heat Abatement
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, we always get one for every car. They fit well and do the best job of keeping the sun out and off the dash. Well worth the cost and it will save your interior
customer_reviews.author: GMYDOC

customer_reviews.title: Good for it's price
customer_reviews.text: I like it, fits my car and blocks the sun beams.
customer_reviews.author: Freelance1980

customer_reviews.title: Great sun shade
customer_reviews.text: Very thick, durable sun shade. Fits great also. A little expensive for what it is but it makes a huge difference in the heat inside the truck.
customer_reviews.author: chad gragg

customer_reviews.title: Glad we found this .
customer_reviews.text: Does the job to protect our suburban dash from the horrible summer heat .
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sunshade for 2013 Chevy Tahoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase. So far, it went through one scorching Texas summer and the shade held up well. The shade's material is sturdy and I would recommend to anyone looking for a quality product
customer_reviews.author: P Botello

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, sturdy, doesn't collapse when it gets hot like the cheaper ones do.
customer_reviews.author: David Ess

customer_reviews.title: This fits like a glove and I used it pretty much all ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits like a glove and I used it pretty much all summer. Dropped the temp in my truck about 10-15 degrees, and in Charleston South Carolina that makes a nice difference. It is very well built and is worth the extra money vice those flimsy cheap aluminum foil ones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Feconda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen covers the windshield almost completely and folds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: FITS MY TAHOE PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO USE, FITS PERFECTLY, AND KEEPS INSIDE MUCH COOLER. GOT IT TO TRAVEL TO ARIZONA AND IT WAS PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Great product! We purchased one for my husbands truck ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We purchased one for my husbands truck before summer hit in Texas & it works great. It covers his whole dash board & protects it from this awful scorching sun! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gragg Family Reviews 🦖

customer_reviews.title: The sun shade itself is very sturdy and fits my window perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding sun shade. I bought it for my 2010 Chevy Silverado 2500HD. It came quickly and was packaged well. The sun shade itself is very sturdy and fits my window perfectly. Once it's in place it does an excellent job of keeping the sun and heat out of my truck. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JkDel

customer_reviews.title: Quality made
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and superior protection. So much better than other products I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bender

customer_reviews.title: it is a little tight around the rear view mirror ...
customer_reviews.text: it is a little tight around the rear view mirror so i often have to adjust it back after putting this in and out. It does fit really well though around the edges etc.
customer_reviews.author: seal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit! Love that it doesn't have the aluminum shine that burns ur eyes like the one my husband has. I love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi M.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality. Not a perfect fit for a 2010 Yukon Denali.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Works great but pricey for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove...not OJ's glove but works perfect. Not sure the materials warrant the high price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great visor. Very well made and fits our 07 Yukon perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My Suerra got so hot inside with the black interior. This heat shield lowered temps quite a bit. It's amazing how hot the outside gold face gets! Only thing is it's kind of big and dIfficult to store out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore W. Nourse

customer_reviews.title: Less tha OEM Sunshade and just as good.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the dash protected. Have to finagle it in to place. Other than that, highly recommended for the price. $40 less expensive than stock and just as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor James Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: ... fits my Tahoe very well and has been a great buy. I can tell a significant difference of ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Tahoe very well and has been a great buy. I can tell a significant difference of the temp inside my vehicle since using. I'm hoping it will help preserve my dashboard from baking in the sun. I'm very pleased with the thickness, quality and fit of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica C

customer_reviews.title: Fits my '11 Silverado.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my '11 Silverado nicely - keeps the heat out but also heats up a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Keith in El Dorado

customer_reviews.title: Quality is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the perfect fit and quality of this windshield sun shade.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got for the husband as a Birthday gift! He loves it. it's made very strong to last.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Covercraft Silver UVS cover.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Bought it for my daughter in law. It fits perfect. She was happy very well made. It is silver in color.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and it is very heavy duty and won't sag like cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Simba

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well into my windshield, covers completely, and folds up very nicely. Very heavy duty, not at all flimsy and while it reflects the sun away, it seems to keep the vehicle cooler.
customer_reviews.author: K9shrink

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 2011 Suburban windshield perfectly. It’s very durable and you notice it doing its job very well in the Texas summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Helps keep my car cool during the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: kae16

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Not a low quality Shade.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Fit, Hard Cardboard not your average one that will bend, This is pretty rigid with a fabric finish on the back side with a nice reflective finish on the sun side. Used it today with 99*f sunny temps, i noticed a big diffetence in my interior temps. Installed in a 2012 Silverado with Black leather interior and Tinted windows.
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shade
customer_reviews.text: This shade is well constructed, fits my Silverado perfectly, and works great. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rick P

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fits truck. Keeps the sun out. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fits truck. Keeps the sun out. The only drawbacks (compared to a foldable heat shield) is that it takes up a lot of room in the cab and you have to be careful not to bend it.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: 2007 Silverado new body style fits perfectly no gaps and dropped the temperature in truck 35 degrees in mid-day sun of SW Florida. will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: James Shipe

customer_reviews.title: Better Than The Flimsy Kind
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect and it works great. Easy enough to fold back up each time. Took some getting used to the fact that it is so stiff and does't fold up very small but its not like there isn't plenty of room to stash it in the Tahoe.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this item!!!! High quality and does the job better than any we've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: NND

customer_reviews.title: Good size and materials, but should work perfectly for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good materials and a good fit on 2008 Tahoe. However, it doesn't wedge itself against the windshield, and the visors don't hold it up against the glass. It's got enough bulk that it weighs down the visors as well. For the price, there should be a way to keep it against the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Joeagg321

customer_reviews.title: Keep your interior un-cooked
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but fits the car exactly. Makes summers in south Texas bearable. We've used many others, but this one is easy to put up and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Wombatman

customer_reviews.title: Just a heavy piece of cardboard
customer_reviews.text: Horrible sunshade. Pain in the ass to install quickly and takes up way too much space when folded. Stay away from this POS.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and in good condition. It fits well and does the job. It's a little bulky but that's to be expected in a fan fold cover like this. It's well worth what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Dorsal Spine

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit around mirror and has gaps on edges
customer_reviews.author: Fainting Goats

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my car very well. It was sold as "custom" design for make and model. Not so.
customer_reviews.author: Shahin Ariaey-Nejad

customer_reviews.title: First was great, second does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Second heat shield I have ordered, but this one is not the same size as my other which perfectly fits the windshield...

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a new car but had used the same model in another car for years and was very happy with it

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but lacking....
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Lacking a sleeve or a band for storage. When not in use, the shield is hard to store neatly in the vehicle

customer_reviews.title: Service was good, but this does not fit a 2016 chevy ...
customer_reviews.text: Service was good, but this does not fit a 2016 chevy Silverado 1500 crew cab. It was advertised to fit in this type of vehicle incorrectly.

customer_reviews.title: Fits the beast perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I have a grandchildren hauling 2007 Suburban and this shade works and fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: shopqueen

customer_reviews.title: perfect for Suburban
customer_reviews.text: durable (had it for a year and it's still like new) plus it fits nicely and easy to take up and down -- 4 stars because I feel that it was just a bit overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J Charles

customer_reviews.title: High quality and fits nice. I wish it had a strap of some ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality and fits nice. I wish it had a strap of some sort to keep it closed when not in use. Deducted one star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great sunshade
customer_reviews.text: Fits my '08 GMC Sierra perfectly, and the gold looks nice with my truck. Since it fits well, it takes an extra second or two to put it up, but it's worth it. VERY well made too.
customer_reviews.author: Ian H

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Product was pretty much an exact fit, there is a little gap on the sides and a decent one at the top but other than that it does the job and looks good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and works great. Only if I could get the wife to use it more to help prevent her dash from getting the inevitable crack.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Dean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this sun shield. Fits perfect for my 13 silverado. It definitely keeps the truck cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Prefect fit, keeps my truck cooler in the south Texas sun.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Neal

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 2010 Silverado. Perfect fit and very good construction. Only drawback is that it is bulky when folded up, a consequence of the very solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Uther

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Highly recommend. I live in OKC, and shield reflects the heat quite well!

customer_reviews.title: It's nice quality but it DOES NOT FIT EXACT
customer_reviews.text: It's nice quality but it DOES NOT FIT EXACT. I have a 2009 silverado and there's a good 2-3 inches on the sides that don't cover.
customer_reviews.author: Bracken Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Windshield visor
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. Very heavy duty. Easy to put up once you do it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Since it is such a near perfect fit I had to learn how to position it to install. I have it down pat now. Keeps my Denali cooler than the cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Haring

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn't seem to fit right, it could have been a little wider.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Easy to open up and fold down. Does a great job at keeping the car a little cooler in the crazy heat of Atlanta Georgia.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Craig Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine used technically but it works extremely well and fits perfectly. I have a GMC Sierra 1500. It helps keep the interior of the car cooler than outside (as much as it can) and protects the dash. Very dourable, not like the flimsy cheap ones you buy in the store. Worth the money, great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product...same quality as weathertech...I have both...perfect fit too

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great investment to protect interior leather and keep unwanted heat out on hot days!

customer_reviews.title: Best windshiled visor ive ever had.
customer_reviews.text: This fits so good and reduces the temp by a significant amount.
customer_reviews.author: Chado San

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works fine with no problems. Very well built and heavy duty. Worth the extra price over cheap knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Good heat shield but cost good money also.
customer_reviews.text: It fits very good in my 2013 Silverado LTZ but because of the Styrofoam back its very easy to damage.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for 2015 Tahoe
customer_reviews.text: Product fits perfect and reduces the heat in the Tahoe
customer_reviews.author: leah

product_meta.title: Covercraft UV10966BL Blue Metallic UVS 100 Custom Fit Sunscreen for Select Cadillac/Chevrolet/GMC Models - Laminate Material, 1 Pack
product_meta.description: Color:Blue MetallicThe UVS100 Sunscreen is an affordable way to protect the interior of your vehicle from damaging UV rays as well as adding a level of comfort and protection by reducing the interior temperature of the vehicle on hot days. The sunscreen is custom-fitted so that there is maximum coverage of the windshield area.
feature_bullets: Custom fit to the windshield for complete coverage
Protect the dash and other interior components from damage by the sun
Reduce the interior temperature of the vehicle on hot days
The foam core center of the shield acts as an insulator
Easy to use and store away when not in use
